metadata.name: SOLAR STATE
metadata.description:
[23rd December 2065, 9:00 pm WAT]
It has been 6 weeks since I landed in Cairo. 
I am yet to see the hunger-ravaged continent they still tell us about in the news.
Africa is beautiful, clean, vibrant...

To anyone who reads this, go get your PACD approvals! 
Our world is dying, but Africa is thriving.
This is the new elysium, the new solar state...
